text: We will hear arguments next in 75-915, Bounds v. Smith.
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the Court.
How in the world would you find out what the court really wants to do?
Well, Your Honor this is a civil rights matter.
Is that what he would say I am going out?
I have seen civil rights cases where that is it.
If Your Honor please it depends --
And secondly, is that helpful to the Court?
If Your Honor please now, in the Middle District of North Carolina these forms, recommended by the Judicial Conference, have in fact been adopted by local rule.
Do they become effective without the knowledge of the Fourth Circuit counsel.
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the Court.
